alert.note: Alert for Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:54PM EDT until August 05 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PISCATAQUIS AND SOUTHWESTERN PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 154 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dover-Foxcroft, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Orneville, Charleston, Bradford, Garland and Atkinson. This includes State Highway 11 near Bradford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
